title: Santa Clause to users
extract: a fat, white-bearded, jolly old man in a red suit, who lives at the North Pole, makes toys for children, and distributes gifts at Christmastime. : also called Father Christmas, Saint Nicholas, Saint Nick. Word origin of 'Santa Claus' < Du dial.
